name: Cinematography Techniques
description: 30 prompts testing camera angles, lenses, framing, composition, and advanced cinematographic techniques

prompts.prompt: Extreme close-up of a human eye, eyelashes in sharp focus, iris detail visible, dramatic macro photography
Close-up shot of hands holding a coffee cup, shallow depth of field, background blurred, intimate detail
Medium shot of character from waist up, neutral background, standard portrait framing, conversational distance
Full body shot of character standing, head to toe visible, environmental context, classic full frame
Extreme wide shot of tiny figure in massive landscape, scale emphasized, environmental dominance, epic scope
Low angle shot looking up at towering character, dramatic power dynamic, sky background, hero perspective
High angle shot looking down at character from above, vulnerability emphasized, diminished presence
Bird's eye view directly overhead, character small in frame, geometric patterns visible, top-down perspective
Worm's eye view from ground level looking straight up, extreme low angle, ceiling or sky dominant
Dutch angle with tilted horizon, disorienting composition, 45-degree tilt, psychological tension
Over-the-shoulder shot, character's shoulder and back of head in foreground, subject in background, conversational framing
Point-of-view shot from character's perspective, seeing exactly what they see, first-person viewpoint
Wide angle lens distortion, curved edges, exaggerated perspective, faces and architecture stretched at frame edges
Telephoto lens compression, flattened depth, background appears closer, stacked visual elements
Fisheye lens extreme distortion, spherical warping, 180-degree field of view, circular vignette edges
Tilt-shift lens miniature effect, selective focus plane, toy-like appearance, blurred top and bottom
Macro lens extreme magnification, tiny subject fills frame, intricate surface details, shallow focus plane
Rule of thirds composition, subject on intersection points, balanced asymmetry, professional framing
Perfect symmetry composition, mirror-like balance, centered subject, architectural precision, Wes Anderson style
Leading lines composition, roads or rails converging to vanishing point, depth guidance, linear perspective
Golden ratio spiral composition, Fibonacci curve layout, natural eye flow, mathematical harmony
Frame within frame composition, doorway or window creating natural frame, layered depth, nested boundaries
Negative space composition, subject small in vast empty area, isolation emphasized, minimalist framing
Forced perspective, nearby object appears same size as distant large object, optical illusion, depth manipulation
Deep depth of field, everything sharp from foreground to background, f/22 aperture look, maximum clarity throughout
Shallow depth of field, subject sharp, background completely blurred bokeh, f/1.4 aperture look, cinematic isolation
Rack focus shift, foreground starts sharp then blurs as background comes into focus, attention guidance, focus pull
Split diopter shot, near and far both sharp with blurred middle, dual focus planes, complex focus rig
Dolly zoom vertigo effect, subject stays same size while background perspective shifts, Hitchcock zoom, disorienting effect
Silhouette composition, subject completely black against bright background, shape emphasis, high contrast backlight
